name: Kerry's Quiz "Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends"  | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
yellow.

	Cheese is really, really stupid and thinks that things aren't really what they are. He is just one of the imaginary friends who live at Foster's.

True.

	Eduardo is a Spanish freak and looks really scary, but he is NOT. He has sharp horns and pointy teeth, but he is scared of EVERYTHING.

a thumb.

	Bloo is probably the funniest character ever. His full name is Blooregard Q. Kazoo.

questions.text: Who did Bloo used to belong to?
questions.explanation:
Mac.

	Bloo used to be Mac's imaginary friend before he went to live at Foster's Home. Mac has a very big head and a small body. He is a shy 8-year-old boy.

questions.text: What does Coco say all the time?
questions.explanation:
"Coco!".

	Coco says nothing but "Coco!" She lays colored plastic eggs with surprises inside.

True.

	And one of Wilt's eyes is smaller than the other. Still, he is very cheerful.

an apartment.

	Mac has a brother who is really evil and very, very stupid. The brother's name is Terrence. He is 13 and has pimples.

questions.text: What kind of friends does Eduardo have that make people itchy?
questions.explanation:
fleas.

	Eduardo goes to the salon every day after he gets out of bed. That's because he has lots of purple fur.

questions.text: What does Cheese hate to be asked?
questions.explanation:
to leave the room.

	When Cheese is asked to leave the room, he says, "NOOOOOOOO!" He can be pretty obnoxious.

False.

	Wilt has a low voice. He is very tall and wears basketball shoes, like Wilt Chamberlain, a famous basketball player. Chamberlain played in the NBA for Philadelphia, San Francisco, and Los Angeles.
